page.title: 14Transport in Kingswood area
page.content: The Kingswood area is very well served as far as transport is concerned. By{road}the area is very close to the M25 which (when completed) will link up with most of the major {motorways}in the country and will run all all around London itself. Green Line and London Transport{buses}pass on the A217. By{rail,}Kingswood Station (just to the north of our area) is the closest and provides services to London at approximately twenty minute intervals during the rush hour. The large numbers of people commuting to London each day prefer rail, since the journey into London can be made in about half an hour. Two main{airports:}Heathrow and Gatwick are also within easy reach.
